summary: The diff adds additional PageHeroImage sections across most pages and updates DomainDraft unauthenticated view to include an image, but it does not add the required static image files under frontend/public/assets/generated (no new assets added). The diff also includes several unrelated UI/layout/form/style enhancements and references to additional generated images that were not part of the requested required image set.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the newly generated image files as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (all required filenames) and reference them from pages.
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added in the diff (Added: 0). The required static assets themselves are therefore not present/verified under frontend/public/assets/generated based on this diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Broader layout/site shell changes (SiteLayout/SiteHeader/SiteFooter) and navigation/accessibility enhancements beyond adding photos to pages.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is specifically about adding more photos and adding specific generated assets; it does not request header/footer/layout refactors or navigation changes.

hallucinated_features.description: ContactForm and AppointmentRequestForm validation/accessibility improvements and new submit hooks.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for form validation/accessibility refactors or new submit hooks; scope is adding photos/static assets.

hallucinated_features.description: Global CSS and Tailwind theme/token changes (including new orange color tokens and overflow prevention).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; requirements focus on adding images and keeping responsiveness, not revising the design system/tokens.

hallucinated_features.description: Use of additional generated image filenames beyond the provided required image list (e.g., hospital-lobby.dim_1600x900.png, hospital-exterior.dim_1600x900.png, emergency-room.dim_1600x900.png, doctor-consultation.dim_1600x900.png, doctors-team.dim_1600x900.png, medical-404-illustration.dim_1200x600.png, medical-decommissioned-illustration.dim_1200x600.png).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 specifies a required set of new images to add/reference. The diff references several other generated assets not listed in the BuildRequestâ€™s required images.
